price: Lalu, Kami wahyukan kepada Musa, "Pukullah lautan itu dengan tongkatmu".  Maka terbelahlah lautan itu dan tiap-tiap belahan adalah seperti gunung yang besar.
arabic: فَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱضۡرِب بِّعَصَاكَ ٱلۡبَحۡرَۖ فَٱنفَلَقَ فَكَانَ كُلُّ فِرۡقٖ كَٱلطَّوۡدِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-awḥaynā ilā mūsā ani iḍ'rib biʿaṣāka al-baḥra fa-infalaqa fakāna kullu fir'qin kal-ṭawdi al-ʿaẓīmi
